## AbstractDevice.setScissor() method

Set scissor rectangle from an array that contains the position and size

**Signature:**

```typescript
setScissor(scissor?: DeviceViewport | number[]): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

scissor


</td><td>

[DeviceViewport](doc/markdown/./device.deviceviewport.md) \| number\[\]


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The scissor rectangle position and size, if not specified, the scissor rectangle will be set to \[0, 0, drawingBufferWidth,drawingBufferHeight\]


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
